name: Ajay Kumar Sahu
summary: Offering nearly 12 years of experience in software/application development with expertise in all phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), project management, and clean coding practices.

education.institution: IIMT College of Engineering Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh Technical University

experience.title: Solution Architect

experience.title: Software Developer
